publicwhip.spmotion: S2M-1863 Robin Harper: Statement of Concern on Noise Pollutionâ€”That the Parliament welcomes and endorses the Marine Connection statement of concern on noise pollution caused by military sonars; believes that trials and use of the S2087 low frequency active sonar contravenes Article 12 of the EU Habitats Directive, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to implement fully the directive in the sea areas for which it has responsibility. Supported by: Eleanor Scott*, Chris Ballance*, Mark Ballard*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Patrick Harvie*
S2M-1863 Statement of Concern on Noise Pollution (lodged on 19 October 2004) Mr Mark Ruskell*
S2M-1863 Statement of Concern on Noise Pollution (lodged on 19 October 2004) Trish Godman*
S2M-1863 Statement of Concern on Noise Pollution (lodged on 19 October 2004) Shiona Baird*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-1863 Statement of Concern on Noise Pollution (lodged on 19 October 2004) Rosie Kane*, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-1863 Statement of Concern on Noise Pollution (lodged on 19 October 2004) John Swinburne*
